alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 21 at 2:20AM MDT until April 21 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26. * WHERE...In Colorado, Grand Valley and Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin. In Utah, Southeast Utah and Arches/Grand Flat. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley
